backgroundInformationList.description: Heritage designation notice for 234 St. George Street.

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1023-2017 to designate 234 St. George Street (Toronto Centre-Rosedale, Ward 27) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE7.13 - Intention to Designate, Part IV, Ontario Heritage Act - 18 Properties with Heritage Easement Agreements
By-law 1023-2017 - To designate the property at 234 St. George Street (Robert Watson House) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 234 St. George Street (Robert Watson House) City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1023-2017 - 234 St. George Street - Heritage Designation
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
